trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a solid color.

For convenience, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes> class provides a set of commonly used <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> objects, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A>.

**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> class provides several special features: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush> objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.

For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values
*predefinedBrushName*
The name of a brush defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes> class, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Orange%2A>.
*rgb*
A three-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.

The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the second digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the third digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
For example, `00F`.
*argb*
A four-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.

The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the second digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
For example, `F00F`.
*rrggbb*
A six-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.

The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
For example, `0000FF`.
*aarrggbb*
An eight-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.

The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
For example, `FF0000FF`.
*scA*
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
*scR*
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
*scG*
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
*scB*
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
*profileUri*
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/includes/tlasharptla-icm-md.md)] color profile.
*alphaValue*
The alpha channel color value.
The value range is from 0.0 through 1.0.
*colorValue*
A comma-delimited list of three to eight values that represent the color channels of the color profile.
The value range is from 0.0 through 1.0.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> class with no color or animations.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>.
The color to apply to the fill.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true.`
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
Gets or sets the color of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>.
For a list of predefined colors, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors> class.
For a list of system colors, see the <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors> class.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The brush's color.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color"></xref> dependency property.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
The binary reader to read the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> from.
The deserialized <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>.
